title: Sans serif - please advise
author: katsk

comments.content: Could be **Aliquam** by [Álvaro Thomáz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073140/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.behance.net/alvarothomaz) but I can't point to any legitimate source. Substitute: [Graphik](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073140/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fcommercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik)
